reviewText: Don't buy this item unless you can unlock your region codes. It's non USA format. They don't tell you that in the description.
Does not work on my DVD player(Samsung), a bit sad and wished it would.
Didn't work here for me as it's region locked.
Will not play in America. Check reviews before purchasing. (The movies are pretty good but not on a dvd that won't play here)
Unable to review will not play on my DVD player or computer. Stated wrong format.
These disks will not play on an Xbox 360. As this is what we use in place of a DVD player I am very disappointed to not have working movies.
It would not work in America.  Had to return it.  Never got my refund.
